brief: Our client needed a website regrouping all the green initiatives on the university’ s campus. The website must be very clear and informative because a lot of students or teachers didn ’t know how to use some initiatives.

reflection.text: We tried to make the website very light and clear. That is why we don’t have a lot of colors but we used free rights illustration to avoid a cold website. We didn’t have a lot of resources so we took photos, built animated videos, wrote articles and animated Incamp’ s social networks.

We have discovered that very few people knew about the initiatives and how they worked. So we have integrated new functionalities like a map (initiatives’ location), a quiz and guides for users. Our client didn ’t know how to use the website so we chose Wordpress and installed very user-friendly plugins for them such as Yoast for example.
We also installed functionalities which helped us to keep track on the websites even after the due date like Google analyst.
